description:
## Tree Data Explorer - View XML, Yaml, JSON as tree

![Screenshot of Tree Data Explorer](https://www.japplis.com/tree-data-explorer/images/tree-data-explorer-screenshot.png)

Explorer for XML, Yaml or JSON data. 
        Navigate the tree structure.
        Including syntax highlight for XML, Yaml and JSON.
        Open the data from a file or paste the text from the clipboard. 
        Navigate the tree using breadcrumbs.
        You can have the window always on top and transparent.
        Tree Data Explorer can also run inside an IDE like IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, PyCharm, Eclipse and NetBeans using the Applet Runner plugin.
summary: View XML, Yaml, JSON as tree
author: Japplis
